title: InfiniteTalk VideoGen - Speed Optimized
description: InfiniteTalk unlimited-length talking video generation optimized for RTX 6000 PRO (96GB VRAM). Features 4 flexible speed modes (35-70% faster) with quality-speed trade-offs. Supports 720p multi-person, I2V and V2V generation. No VAE tiling, no swapping, everything in VRAM.

gpuTypeId: NVIDIA RTX PRO 6000 Blackwell Server Edition
NVIDIA RTX PRO 6000 Blackwell Workstation Edition
NVIDIA RTX PRO 6000 Blackwell Max-Q Workstation Edition
